Package org.apache.heron.packing.builder

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Scorer<T>
    Scores an object based on some heuristic.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Container
    Class that describes a container used to place Heron Instances with specific memory, CPU and disk requirements.
    ContainerIdScorer
    Sorts containers ascending by container id.
    HomogeneityScorer
    Scores based on how homogeneous a container is relative to a given component, from highest to lowest.
    InstanceCountScorer
    Scores based on total instances on a container, from lowest to highest
    PackingPlanBuilder
    Class that helps with building packing plans.
    PackingPlanBuilderTest  
    ResourceRequirement
    Helper class that captures the RAM and CPU requirements of each component
    ScorerTest
    Tests scorers.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SortingStrategy
